summary:
Innovation-enthusiast PhD candidate MD with a solution-oriented, synthesizing and strategic mindset.
Currently working in top-tier, innovative medical device R&D and manufacturing as clinical scientist. 
Previous experience in product and market strategy development in the clinical trial equipment supply market, original pharma development strategy, scientific project management in pharma and medical device development, primary- and acute patient care, vascular medicine, radiology and cardiology.

This makes it very difficult to fully utilise this data to benefit patients.  The goal of EHDEN is to make the large-scale analysis of health data in Europe a reality. The project aims to do this by building a federated data network of allowing access to the data of 100 million EU citizens standardised to a common data model.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Viktor', 'last_name': 'Óriás', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Clinical Scientist at Philips'}]}]
